      • getLevel

        @Deprecated
default Plugin.AlertThreshold getLevel()
        Deprecated. (2.7.0) No longer used, the AlertThreshold is only needed for/by PluginPassiveScanner.
        Gets the alert threshold of the scanner.

        Default implementation returns always Plugin.AlertThreshold.MEDIUM.

        Returns:
        the alert threshold of the scanner.

      • setLevel

        @Deprecated
default void setLevel(Plugin.AlertThreshold level)
        Deprecated. (2.7.0) No longer used, the AlertThreshold is only needed for/by PluginPassiveScanner.
        Sets the alert threshold of the scanner.

        Default implementation does nothing.

        Parameters:
        level - the new alert threshold.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given parameter is null.
